sentence.Network_en: The idea of Healthy, Brief, Fashion, Comfort, Leisure " accepted pervasively. "
sentence.Network_cn: “健康 、 简约 、 时尚 、 舒适 、 休闲 ” 家居理念得到人们认同.

sentence.Network_en: Knowledge is being used pervasively in the overall economic system.
sentence.Network_cn: 知识与资讯正全面渗透到整个经济运作过程中去.

sentence.Network_en: The more pervasively the language is used, the more smoothly understanding will flow.
sentence.Network_cn: 这种语言的使用越普遍, 理解起来就越容易.

list.abs: TIME词汇1000 - 豆丁网 ... persuasive 有说服力的 pervasive 遍布的 phony 伪造的.
HR英语_百度文库 ... 领先性 primacy 普遍性 pervasiveness 忧虑 fear.
无处不在 (PervasiveneSS):是要求可口可乐公司的产品必须渗透到市场的每一个角落，使得消费者能够在任何时候、任何地点都可以 …
普适计算(Pervasive Computing)也称无处不在计算(Ubiquitous Computing)，它集移动通信技术、计算技术、小型计算设备制造技术、 …
普及运算(Pervasive computing)：看不见的，嵌入我们周遭物件里的随处运算。 网站服务(Web services)：全面的，事先制造企业 …
英语口译中需要注意的词组 ... 遥控器 remote controller 无孔不入 all pervasive 毗邻而居 be adjacent to.

auth_sentence.content: But it was in the Renaissance that the papal patronage found its most pervasively influential role.
auth_sentence.res_content: But it was in the Renaissance that the papal patronage found its most pervasively influential role.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But it was in the Renaissance that the papal patronage found its most pervasively influential role.

auth_sentence.content: I wanted to keep it clear that he was never for one instant welcome in my house, and that I pervasively did not like him.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: I wanted to keep it clear that he was never for one instant welcome in my house, and that I pervasively did not like him.
